author: jstrachan
msg: Added unit test to test DTD validation using <assertValid> tag inside JellyUnit.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch to allow DTD validation to work as well as XML Schema, RelaxNG, Relax and TREX.

This trick is that to detect a DTD the MSV library needs the systemID to be defined and to end in .dtd otherwise the schema is assumed to be in XML format and the namespaces are used to determine which schema language it is.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added an <assertValid> tag which can be used in JellyUnit scripts to assert that a section of XML is valid according to some XML Schema, RelaxNG, Relax or TREX.
DTDs should work too, as MSV supports that too I think, but isn't quite working yet.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o bumping up the version and pushing another copy to the repository
